title: Cardax - DEX on Cardano phase 2,3,4
description: There is currently no decentralized exchange (DEX) on Cardano. Tokens built on Cardano dont have a 'native exchange' to list yet.
solution: Cardax - The first DEX in the Cardano ecosystem. Cardax will be like Uniswap but on Cardano.
experience: Our tech team has 3 blockchain developers who have finished the Plutus Pioneers program, one front-end developer, one back-end developer.
